headline: This Investing Pro Delivers a 5.5% Yield With Low Volatility. Here Are His Secrets.
summary: Ed Perks, manager of the 73-year-old Franklin Income Fund, is investing equally in stocks and bonds, often from the same companies. He shares some picks.
